thread.title: Isaiah Thomas Wants To Reprise Muggsy Bogues' Character in a "Space Jam" Sequel
thread.title_full: Isaiah Thomas Wants To Reprise Muggsy Bogues' Character in a "Space Jam" Sequel | Complex UK

author: Dana Scott
title: Isaiah Thomas Wants To Reprise Muggsy Bogues' Character in a "Space Jam" Sequel
text:
Boston Celtics point guard Isaiah Thomas believes that he has the acting chops to appear in a sequel for Space Jam . The 1996 intergalactic-cartoon basketball cult classic had appearances from NBA legends including Michael Jordan, Patrick Ewing, Charles Barkley, Larry Johnson, Muggsy Bogues and former NBA dunk-posterized center Shawn Bradley.
Now that the sequel has been long-rumoured to be green-lit, and current NBA stars Lebron James and Blake Griffin who have showed interest for their cameos in the new version of the film. The 5-foot-9 Isaiah Thomas is joining their company wanting a role in the flick. The character that 5-foot-3 Muggsy Bogues played in the first Space Jam, and Thomas stated his desire to be casted on Twitter:
Watching Space Jam right now. If they make a Space Jam2 I have to be the new Muggsy Bogues lol
â€” Isaiah Thomas (@Isaiah_Thomas) October 10, 2015
[via ProBasketballTalk ]
